column1: Little Goat Diner////I loved Girl and the Goat so I was pumped for Little Goat Diner since breakfast food is my jam. I had a really tiring night and was half asleep at arrival but the food invigorated my soul. We ordered the this little piggy went to China
column4: and the fatoush salad. The waitress was very nice and helpful in giving us the most popular dishes which we then ordered.
